Swire Coca-Cola announced today that it will focus its global strategy on China and relocate its China headquarters from Hong Kong to the Pudong New Area in Shanghai, Xinhua reports.

The company signed a strategic cooperation memorandum with the local goverment on Wednesday. It will increase investment in the Pudong New Area and relocate its China headquarters to better expand its business in China, according to the memorandum.

As one of the largest Coca-Cola bottling groups in the world, Swire Coca-Cola has the exclusive right to manufacture, market and distribute products of the Coca-Cola Company in 11 provinces and Shanghai in the Chinese mainland, as well as Hong Kong, Taiwan and an extensive area of the western United States, which represents a total franchise population of 728 million.

In 2018, Swire Coca-Cola had annual sales of still and sparkling drinks of 1.6 billion unit cases, according to the company.

據新華社報導，太古可口可樂今天宣布，將把全球戰略重點放在中國，並將其中國總部從香港遷至上海浦東新區。

公司週三與當地政府簽署了戰略合作備忘錄。根據備忘錄，它將增加對浦東新區的投資，並重新安置其中國總部，以更好地擴展其在中國的業務。

作為全球最大的可口可樂裝瓶集團之一，太古可口可樂擁有在中國大陸11個省份和上海以及香港製造，營銷和分銷可口可樂公司產品的獨家權利 ，台灣和美國西部的廣大地區，佔特許經營總人口7.28億。

據公司稱，2018年，太古可口可樂公司每年銷售16億個單位飲料。
